All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AIClientTUI
 
AIPlayer
The AIPlayer class represents an AI player in a Dots and Boxes game.
Board
The Board class represents the game board for a Dots and Boxes game.
Client
Represents a client that connects to the game server.
ClientConnection
 
ClientHandler
Represents a handler for individual clients connected to the server.
ClientListener
A listener interface for handling disconnection events in a client-server communication scenario.
ClientListenerGUI
 
ConnectLine
Custom extension of JavaFX Line class representing a line connecting two dots on the game board, for the GUI only.
Dot
Represents a dot on the game board.
DotsAndBoxesGUI
The DotsAndBoxesGUI class represents the graphical user interface for the Dots and Boxes game.
Game
The Game class represents the game logic for a Dots and Boxes game.
GameServer
The GameServer class is responsible for creating and managing games and represents the server for the Dots And Boxes Game.
GUI2
The DotsAndBoxesGUI class represents the graphical user interface for the Dots and Boxes game.
Line
Represents a line on the game board.
MoveMadeListener
The MoveMadeListener interface defines methods to be implemented by classes that listen for move events and game over events in a Dots and Boxes game.
Player
The Player class represents a player in a Dots and Boxes game.
PlayerClientTUI
 
Protocol
Protocol class with constants for creating BoardDrawingGame.ServerClient.protocol messages
ServerConnection
Represents a server-side connection handling for Dots And Boxes.
SocketConnection
Wrapper for a Socket and implements reading messages that consist of a single line from the socket.
SocketServer
Implements a networking server which accepts connection from clients.
SquaresToDrawForUI
Represents information about squares to draw on the UI.
Utility
The Utility class provides utility methods as an helper class for calculating points, checking game completion,and determining squares to draw on the UI in a Dots and Boxes game.
